name: Dream line
description:
BASICALLY

Platformer
with
Interesting
Gameplay

This is a platformer, And made for a  Game Jam. With a Theme  HEAL.
          You as a player must find a way out and also find some mystery along the way.
     This isn't an easy task buddy, as you just fall from old mining cave and full of trap and spikes which is very dangerous as you probably known.

  So what are you waiting for there no more time you should find a way out RIGHT NOW before you died of a blood loss.
